summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for the acquisition and installation of a sculpture by Michael Heizer; establishing a "Michael Heizer Sculpture" subaccount in the "Civic Arts Account" of the "General Donations and Gift Trust Fund," accepting donations thereto and a grant from the National Endowment for the Arts for said sculpture, appropriating such donations, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
